issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I set the property "focusable" of the button object to true, also I set the properties backgroundColor and backgroundSelectedColor. When i run test and give to my button focus, the color of the button not changed. The same situation with backgroundSelectedImage, backgroundFocusedColor and backgroundFocusedImage.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Background colors and background Images of objects don't change when focusable
